page.title: 12Sundays
page.content: On Sundays I usually get up early and take the dog for a walk into the countryside.After breakfast I go out on my bicycle while dad has an extra long lie-in.At twelve o'clock I have lunch of cheese and pickle sandwiches with some orange juice while I watch the television.After that I go out on my bicycle and ride round the area. Whilst my mum is cooking the dinner I watch my childrens programmes on the television and play with my dog.Then I read a book for a couple of hours, mum serves up the dinner of roast chicken.Preceding that I go upstairs for a bath and then I get into bed and read for a few minutes.
